sentences.en: He will always be remembered Anfield for that Cardiff belter.
sentences.cn: 他会因为在加迪夫的优异表现而被安菲尔德永远铭记.

sentences.en: Purpose  To adjust steam huffing profile and belter injection effect.
sentences.cn: 目的调整吸汽剖面,改善注汽效果.

sentences.en: You'd belter sail with sea chart, for this area is very complex.
sentences.cn: 你最好携带海图出行, 这片海域的海况很复杂.

trans.tran_cn: [俚语]激昂奔放的流行歌曲，非常好， 出色的例子，嘹亮的歌，了不起的人或事
